mapper.select: select avg(revRate) revRate from (select reservation.houseCode, revRate from reservation, review where reservation.reserveCode=review.reservecode and houseCode=#{value}) a group by houseCode
mapper.insert: insert into house( houseCode, houseName, memberCode, zipCode, sido, sigungu, roadName, bName, address, jibunAddress, latlng, detailAddress, local, people, bed, price ) values( house_houseCode_seq.nextval, #{houseName}, #{memberCode}, #{zipCode}, #{sido}, #{sigungu}, #{roadName}, #{bName}, #{address}, #{jibunAddress}, #{latLng}, #{detailAddress}, #{local}, #{people}, #{bed}, #{price} )
